parameters.name: DbType
parameters.description:
The type of database. Valid values:

*   **MySQL**
*   **SQLServer**
*   **PostgreSQL**
*   **Oracle**
*   **DRDS**
*   **OceanBase**
*   **Mongo**
*   **Redis**

parameters.name: EnvType
parameters.description: The type of the environment to which databases belong. For more information, see [Change the environment type of an instance](~~163309~~).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ReturnGuid
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return the GUID of each table.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword that is used to query tables.

parameters.name: SearchRange
parameters.description:
The scope of tables that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **HAS_PERMSSION**: the tables on which the current account has permissions.
*   **OWNER**: the tables owned by the current account.
*   **MY_FOCUS**: the tables that the current account follows.
*   **UNKNOWN**: all tables.

parameters.name: SearchTarget
parameters.description:
The type of table that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **TABLE**: physical and logical tables
*   **SINGLE_TABLE**: physical tables
*   **LOGIC_TABLE**: logical tables

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> To view the tenant ID, move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner of the Data Management (DMS) console. For more information, see the [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.
